underlying_goal: Fix a DBFS root disabled error in a streaming job by migrating checkpoint paths from deprecated DBFS root (/tmp/) to Unity Catalog Volumes, and create a skill document about DBFS root

brief_summary: User asked to fix a DBFS root disabled error and create a skill about DBFS root; Claude investigated thoroughly, created a plan document, but the session ended during plan mode before full implementation.
